title: Docker Fundamentals
description: Learn to build and deploy your distributed applications easily to the cloud with Docker

courses.title: Docker: Base commands
courses.description: Learn the base Docker commands to run and manage containers

courses.title: Docker: Manage images
courses.description: Learn how to manage and create images from changed containers

courses.title: Docker: Build images with Dockerfile
courses.description: Learn how to build Docker images using Dockerfiles
